page.title: 03LAW AND ORDER
page.content: Law and order centres around the police station in Hinderton Road It receives about 40 enquiries a day About 80-85% of crimes turn out to be assaults. It also receives about two{hoaxes}a day. Most petty crime especially burgulary is committed by minors.Drunken driving and alcohol related offences are prevalent in the evenings.Drug related offences are on the increase and two officers are allocated to a{drug squad}.Serious crime is almost unheard of.There are facilities for holding prisoners at the local police station as well as a {magistrate's court.}There are twenty policemen on the local force, which include two plain clothes and one uniformed C.I.D. officers and one W.P.C.. There are always two police cars available.
